# Schedule

- 8:25-8:30 Welcome.

- 8:30-9:00 "**Estimating running correlations for two environmental time series: not running into problems**" by *[Josué Moisés Polanco Martínez](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Josue-Polanco-Martinez)*, Assistant Professor, Universidad of Salamanca.

- 9:00-9:30 "**Climate change perceptions, environmental actions, support for policy, 
and information provision: experimental evidence from the US**" by *[Chiara Binelli](https://sites.google.com/view/chiara-binelli/home)*, Associate Professor, University of Bologna.

- 9:30-10:00 "**State space models for paleo time series**" by *[Mikkel Bennedsen](https://sites.google.com/site/mbennedsen/)*, Associate Professor, Aarhus University. [Link to paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2311.01053).

- 10:00-10:30 Coffee break.

- 10:30-11:00 "**Green portfolios**" by *[Frederik Lundtofte](https://sites.google.com/site/frederiklundtofte/)*, Professor, Aalborg University.

- 11:00-11:30 “**State space models for paleo time series**" by *[Eric Hillebrand](https://sites.google.com/site/erichillebrand/)*, Professor, Aarhus University.

- 11:30-11:40 Break.

- 11:40-12:00 [Hackathon instructions](earthday2024_hackathon.qmd#instructions) and Q&A.

- 12:00-16:30 Hackathon with pizza drop around 13:00. 

- 16:30-17:00 Evaluation of solutions.

- 17:00 Hackathon winner announcement.

- 12:00-17:00 Meme competition.

- 18:30 Event dinner for speakers and organizers.

Presentations are 25 minutes + 5 minutes for questions.
